1418780.name: Nestphalia 1401
1418780.description:
Nestphalia 1401 is a Tower Defense/Real Time Strategy hybrid about careful planning and precise tactics. Take as much time as you need in the Fort Editor to design your perfect fortress, then command it's troops in battle with careful application of Tactics. Unlike other RTS games, rapid inputs are far less effective than carefully measured action.

In the campaign, you'll become an outsider to Nestphalia. You are determined to reach the capitol and solve the mystery behind the disappearance of your friends, and you'll make new friends (and enemies) along the way.

Key Features:

  • 30 level campaign with a plot that will keep you infested invested.

  • export and share forts. Challenge your friends, or join one of our community tournaments!

  • custom game engine designed from the ground up for modding support.

Nestphalia is waiting, make your mark!
1418780.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
